message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.SE, cs.CY 

The paper focuses on designing an Automated Responding System for app reviews, which involves natural language processing and human-computer interaction. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction). The paper also discusses the characteristics of reviews and their responses, which involves text analysis and information retrieval, making cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval) likely sub-categories as well. The paper also touches on software engineering and cybersecurity issues related to app development, which could fall under cs.SE (Software Engineering) and cs.CY (Cybersecurity) sub-categories.
